00034 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 // Function: SystemColumn()
00036 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 SystemColumn::SystemColumn(QString const& name, SystemColumnLayout* layout,
00038                            QGraphicsScene* scene) : QGraphicsRectItem(0, scene),
00039                                                     layout_(layout), name_(), nameLabel_(0)
00040 {
00041     setFlag(ItemIsMovable);
00042     setFlag(ItemIsSelectable);
00043     setFlag(ItemSendsGeometryChanges);
00044     setBrush(QBrush(QColor(210, 210, 210)));
00045     setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 1));
00046 
00047     // Update the name label.
00048     nameLabel_ = new QGraphicsTextItem(this);
00049     QFont font = nameLabel_->font();
00050     font.setBold(true);
00051     nameLabel_->setFont(font);
00052     setName(name);
00053 }

00062 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 // Function: setName()
00064 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 void SystemColumn::setName(QString const& name)
00066 {
00067     nameLabel_->setHtml("<center>" + name + "</center>");
00068     nameLabel_->setTextWidth(std::max<unsigned int>(140, WIDTH));
00069     nameLabel_->setPos((WIDTH - nameLabel_->textWidth()) / 2.0, 5.0);
00070 
00071     name_ = name;
00072     emit contentChanged();
00073 }

00075 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 // Function: addItem()
00077 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 void SystemColumn::addItem(MappingComponentItem* item, bool load)
00079 {
00080     // Map the position to the column's local coordinate system
00081     // and constrain the item to the horizontal center of the column.
00082     QPointF pos = mapFromScene(item->scenePos());
00083     pos.setX(WIDTH / 2.0);
00084 
00085     item->setPos(pos);
00086     item->setFlag(ItemStacksBehindParent);
00087 
00088     // Set the column as the parent of the item.
00089     item->setParentItem(this);
00090 
00091     if (load)
00092     {
00093         // Place the item at the correct index in the items list.
00094         for (int i = 0; i < items_.size(); ++i)
00095         {
00096             if (item->y() < items_.at(i)->y())
00097             {
00098                 items_.insert(i, item);
00099                 return;
00100             }
00101         }
00102 
00103         // If we got here, the item must be placed at the end of the list.
00104         items_.append(item);
00105     }
00106     else
00107     {
00108         items_.append(item);
00109 
00110         VStackedLayout::updateItemMove(items_, item, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00111         VStackedLayout::setItemPos(items_, item, WIDTH / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00112     }
00113 }
00114 
00115 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00116 // Function: removeItem()
00117 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 void SystemColumn::removeItem(MappingComponentItem* item)
00119 {
00120     items_.removeAll(item);
00121     setParentItem(0);
00122     VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(items_, WIDTH / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00123 }

00125 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00126 // Function: setOffsetY()
00127 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 void SystemColumn::setOffsetY(qreal y)
00129 {
00130     // Update the rectangle and the label position.
00131     setRect(0, y, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
00132     nameLabel_->setPos(nameLabel_->x(), 5 + y);
00133 }

00135 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00137 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 void SystemColumn::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00139 {
00140     // Discard mouse move if the diagram is protected.
00141     if (static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->isProtected())
00142     {
00143         return;
00144     }
00145 
00146     QGraphicsRectItem::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00147 
00148     setZValue(1001.0);
00149     layout_->onMoveColumn(this);
00150 }
00151 
00152 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 // Function: mouseReleaseEvent()
00154 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00155 void SystemColumn::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00156 {
00157     QGraphicsRectItem::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00158 
00159     setZValue(0.0);
00160     layout_->onReleaseColumn(this);
00161 
00162     // Create an undo command only if the position really changed.
00163     QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd;
00164 
00165     if (pos() != oldPos_)
00166     {
00167         cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new SystemColumnMoveCommand(layout_, this, oldPos_));
00168     }
00169     else
00170     {
00171         cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new QUndoCommand());
00172     }
00173 
00174     // End position update for the interconnections.
00175     foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, conns_)
00176     {
00177         conn->endUpdatePosition(cmd.data());
00178     }
00179 
00180     conns_.clear();
00181 
00182     if (cmd->childCount() > 0 || pos() != oldPos_)
00183     {
00184         static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00185         emit contentChanged();
00186     }
00187 }

00189 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 // Function: onMoveItem()
00191 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 void SystemColumn::onMoveItem(MappingComponentItem* item, SystemColumn* oldColumn)
00193 {
00194     // Determine the column under the item's current position.
00195     SystemColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(item->scenePos());
00196 
00197     // Check if the column is different than the current one.
00198     if (column != 0 && column != this)
00199     {
00200         // We have to switch the column and update this column's item positions
00201         // without the moving item.
00202         items_.removeAll(item);
00203 
00204         QPointF newPos = column->mapFromScene(item->scenePos());
00205         item->setParentItem(column);
00206         item->setPos(newPos);
00207 
00208         VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(items_, WIDTH / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00209         setZValue(0.0);
00210 
00211         // And call the new column's onMoveItem().
00212         column->onMoveItem(item, oldColumn);
00213         return;
00214     }
00215 
00216     setZValue(1001.0);
00217 
00218     // Restrict the position so that the item cannot be placed too high.
00219     item->setPos(snapPointToGrid(item->x(), std::max(MIN_Y_PLACEMENT - item->boundingRect().top(), item->y())));
00220     VStackedLayout::updateItemMove(items_, item, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00221 }
00222 
00223 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00224 // Function: onReleaseItem()
00225 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00226 void SystemColumn::onReleaseItem(MappingComponentItem* item)
00227 {
00228     setZValue(0.0);
00229     VStackedLayout::setItemPos(items_, item, WIDTH / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00230 }

00232 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00233 // Function: updateItemPositions()
00234 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00235 void SystemColumn::updateItemPositions()
00236 {
00237     // Just update the item positions.
00238     VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(items_, WIDTH / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00239 }

00257 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00258 // Function: itemChange()
00259 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00260 QVariant SystemColumn::itemChange(GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant &value)
00261 {
00262     switch (change)
00263     {
00264     case ItemPositionChange:
00265         {
00266             return QPointF(value.toPointF().x(), 0.0);
00267         }
00268     }
00269 
00270     return QGraphicsRectItem::itemChange(change, value);
00271 }

00273 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00274 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00275 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00276 void SystemColumn::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00277 {
00278     QGraphicsRectItem::mousePressEvent(event);
00279 
00280     oldPos_ = pos();
00281 
00282     // Begin position update for the connections.
00283     foreach (MappingComponentItem* item, items_)
00284     {
00285         foreach (QGraphicsItem* childItem, item->childItems())
00286         {
00287             if (childItem->type() == ProgramEntityItem::Type)
00288             {
00289                 ProgramEntityItem* progEntity = static_cast<ProgramEntityItem*>(childItem);
00290 
00291                 foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, progEntity->getEndpoints())
00292                 {
00293                     foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, endpoint->getConnections())
00294                     {
00295                         if (!conns_.contains(conn))
00296                         {
00297                             conn->beginUpdatePosition();
00298                             conns_.insert(conn);
00299                         }
00300                     }
00301                 }
00302             }
00303         }
00304     }
00305 }
